there at an extremely extremely high

transformations in SQL I already had my

repo and then by replacing the um
references to tables with this ref
function DBT creates a directed a cyclic
graph a dag from your Transformations
when you tell DBT to run going to
iterate through this dag in the correct
order and turn every single query into a
view or a table depending on how you
have things configured you don't have to
write any create view as any create
table as it's just all select statements
and the only magic thing is this ref
function once I've created this
transformation layer I connected my bi
tool to those views and tables rather
than uh running the those queries again
and again this made my business

um on my Local Host there this stock
